input_text:
HANDS-ON DOCKER WORKSHOP
DevOps Training GmbH

Friday, February 28, 2025 | 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM CET
Tech Hub Berlin, Training Room 3
Alexanderplatz 7, 10178 Berlin, Germany

Instructor: Marcus Schmidt (m.schmidt@devopstraining.de)

Schedule:
09:00-09:45 Introduction to Containers
09:45-11:15 Docker Basics - Hands-on Lab
11:15-11:30 Coffee Break
11:30-13:00 Docker Compose and Multi-container Apps
13:00-14:00 Lunch Break
14:00-15:30 Best Practices and Production Deployment
15:30-16:00 Final Project and Q&A

Price: €299 | Max 20 participants
Register by February 20: https://devopstraining.de/workshops/docker

Prerequisites: Basic command line knowledge
Requirements: Laptop with Docker Desktop installed

Downloads:
- Prerequisites guide: https://devopstraining.de/docker-prereqs.pdf
- Lab setup: https://devopstraining.de/docker-setup.pdf

Contact: workshops@devopstraining.de | +49-30-555-0123

expected_json.special_instructions: Basic command line knowledge required. Laptop with Docker Desktop pre-installed.
